text: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya telah Kami buatkan bagi manusia dalam Al Quran ini setiap macam perumpamaan supaya mereka dapat pelajaran.
